mapper.select: select t.id as "id", t.department_code as "departmentCode", t.department_name as "departmentName", t.department_name as "label" from department t order by t.department_code
mapper.delete: delete from department f where f.id = #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: update department t set t.department_code = #{departmentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t.department_name = #{departmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
